metadata.title: OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH (M FRIESEN AND K APPLEBAUM SECTION EDITORS) Recent Research on Occupational Animal Exposures and Health Risks: A Narrative Review

abstract.original_text: Purpose of Review In the last year, an increasing number of studies have reported on methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) transmission in Africa and Asia and in migrant workers. We reviewed original research on occupational health and safety of animal workers published from
